ygData.subject: Re: Quick Change of Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: got disconected again however i figered it out.u can create shortcuts to put to ur inventry to put at the bottom left hand side boxes.just do it the normal way
ygData.messageBody:
got disconected again however i figered it out.u can create shortcuts to
put to ur inventry to put at the bottom left hand side boxes.just do it
the normal way ...click and hold.then creat a short cut for melee
weapon,put the 2 shortcuts together and u can change the weapons
without goin to inventry
